title: Requirements for Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) in Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL)
source: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links INT
abstract:
Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) is a general term
used to identify functions and toolsets to troubleshoot and monitor
networks.  This document presents OAM requirements applicable to
the Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL).
